original_text: God will bless you more than any other people on the earth. All your people and all your animals will have children of their own.
korean_text: 네가 복을 받음이 만민보다 훨씬 더하여 너희 중의 남녀와 너희의 짐승의 암수에 생육하지 못함이 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: more than any other people on the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 땅 위의 다른 어떤 사람들보다 더

sentences.original_text: will have children of their own
